name: Captain Trench & his Band of World War Hero Bandits
name_original: Captain Trench & his Band of World War Hero Bandits
description:
Take out the enemy troops, blast the tanks and incoming bombs on your way to Victory in this epic shoot em up game.

Join Captain Trench and his Platoon of Commando Heroes in the frontier War Zone and command their biggest Operation yet. Along with Captain Crime and Daddy Cool, there are 5 other crazy Company Comrades to choose from, so what are you waiting for? March them on the Warzone and let the Battle begin!

Your enemies will soon home in on you, so make sure you pick up those loose grenades and handy packs of dynamite to blast them all to smithereens when the going gets tough.

Collect all medal badges to upgrade your platoon leader and before you know it, Yippee-ki-yay Bruce will be leading your Troops to the Front Line.

Features :
- Game Center Leaderboards
- Seven ultimate Battlefield Heroes
- Tons of Cool Power Ups
- Fast Blast Action Gameplay
